mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_NAME, S.STUDY_MAX_COUNT, S.STUDY_TYPE, TO_CHAR(S.STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_PERIOD, S.STUDY_MAIN_IMG, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.PROFILE_IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_MEMBER SM2 WHERE SM2.STUDY_NO = S.STUDY_NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM "STUDY" S LEFT JOIN STUDY_MEMBER SM ON S.STUDY_NO = SM.STUDY_NO AND SM.STUDY_CAP = 'Y' LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" M ON SM.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE S.STUDY_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT STUDY_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM "STUDY_MEMBER" WHERE STUDY_CAP = 'Y'

SELECT STUDY_NO ,STUDY_NAME, STUDY_MAX_COUNT, STUDY_TYPE, TO_CHAR(STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS STUDY_DATE, STUDY_PERIOD, STUDY_MAIN_IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_MEMBER SM WHERE SM.STUDY_NO = S.STUDY_NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM "STUDY" S WHERE STUDY_DEL_FL = 'N'
